00027 struct TestLife : CppUnit::TestFixture {
00028     // -----
00029     // tests
00030     // -----
00031 
00032     void test_in () {
00033                 istringstream in("2\n3\n.*.\n0+-\n");
00034                 Life<Cell> l;
00035                 in >> l;
00036 
00037 
00038                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!l._grid[0][0].isAlive());
00039                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][1].isAlive());
00040                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[1][0].isAlive());
00041                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[1][1].isAlive());
00042                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!l._grid[1][2].isAlive());
00043         }
00044 
00045         void test_conway_1 () {
00046                 istringstream in("3\n3\n...\n.*.\n...\n");
00047                 Life<ConwayCell> l;
00048                 in >> l;
00049 
00050                 l.move();
00051 
00052 
00053                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!l._grid[1][1].isAlive());
00054         }
00055 
00056         void test_conway_2 () {
00057                 istringstream in("2\n3\n***\n...\n");
00058                 Life<ConwayCell> l;
00059                 in >> l;
00060 
00061                 l.move();
00062 
00063                 ostringstream out;
00064                 out << l;
00065 
00066                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "Generation = 1, Population = 2.\n.*.\n.*.\n\n");
00067         }
00068 
00069         void test_fredkin_1 () {
00070                 istringstream in("1\n1\n3\n");
00071                 Life<FredkinCell> l;
00072                 in >> l;
00073 
00074                 l.move();
00075 
00076                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][0].age == -1);
00077         }
00078 
00079         void test_fredkin_2 () {
00080                 istringstream in("1\n2\n33\n");
00081                 Life<FredkinCell> l;
00082                 in >> l;
00083 
00084                 l.move();
00085 
00086                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][0].age == 4);
00087                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][1].age == 4);
00088         }
00089 
00090         void test_fredkin_3 () {
00091                 istringstream in("1\n2\n+9\n");
00092                 Life<FredkinCell> l;
00093                 in >> l;
00094 
00095                 l.move();
00096 
00097                 ostringstream out;
00098                 out << l;
00099 
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][0].age == 11);
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][1].age == 10);
00102                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "Generation = 1, Population = 2.\n++\n\n");
00103         }
00104 
00105         void test_fredkin_4 () {
00106                 istringstream in("1\n2\n3-\n");
00107                 Life<FredkinCell> l;
00108                 in >> l;
00109 
00110                 l.move();
00111 
00112                 ostringstream out;
00113                 out << l;
00114 
00115                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][0].age == -1);
00116                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][1].age == 0);
00117                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "Generation = 1, Population = 1.\n-0\n\n");
00118 
00119                 l.move();
00120                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][0].age == 0);
00121                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(l._grid[0][1].age == -1);
00122         }
00123
